intent: Discount for two items with special price per unit. Single eligible item with quantity just enough for discount.
Discount for four items with special price per unit. Single eligible item with quantity greater than required for discount.
Discount for four items with special price per unit. Multiple eligible items, same unit price.
Discount for five items with special price per unit. Single eligible item with more than required quantity.
Discount for two items of item1 and three items of item2 with special price per unit. One item from multiple eligible items meeting the condition.
Discount for three items of item1 and three items of item2 with special price per unit. Multiple eligible items with exact pairs for discount.
